short_summary: Provides a Cyclic Corrosion Test Chamber System, with an end date of 2024-03-29
description: The system must meet operational requirements of Natural Resources Canada.
full_summary:
**Tender Notice - Cyclic Corrosion Test Chamber System**
==============================================

**Reference number:** WS4365101106
**Publication date:** December 21, 2023
**Tender closing date:** January 8, 2024, 2:00 PM (EST)
**Expected contract start date:** January 12, 2024
**Expected contract end date:** April 30, 2024

**Contract overview:**
Natural Resources Canada is seeking a Cyclic Corrosion Test Chamber System to support their operational requirements.

**Key specifications:**
* The system must be able to withstand the cyclic corrosion testing requirements.
* The system shall be delivered on or before March 29, 2024.
* Bidder should have expertise in designing and installing test chambers for corrosion testing.

**Solicitation details:**
A request for proposal (RFP) will be issued; hence, interested bidders must submit their proposal electronically through Ariba Discovery (RFx number: 18344627).

**Instructions to bid:**
* Bidders must submit their bid electronically on or before the closing date.
* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2:00 PM (EST) on December 22, 2023.
* Late bids will be considered non-responsive.

**Contact information:**
The Canadian government is inviting all qualified suppliers to participate in this procurement. For additional information, please contact:
Andrew Denbeigh
Department of Public Works and Government Services
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5
Phone: Not available
Email: [andrew.denbeigh@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:andrew.denbeigh@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Cancellation notice:**
